text: Suppose you are given a modified BST with only two nodes interchanged with each other. As a result, this modified BST no longer follows the properties of a BST. What would be the worst-case time and space complexity of the algorithm that would correctly identify those two nodes? (a) O (n) and O (n) (b) O (log n) and O (1) (C) O (log n) and O (n) (D) O (n) and O (1)
